Title: Relates to including certain employees or volunteers of youth organizations as mandated reporters
Summary: Relates to including certain employees or volunteers of youth organizations whose primary purpose is to interact with youth through activities, events or other one on one group gatherings as mandated reporters.
LawCode: Amd ยง413, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to including certain employees or volunteers of youth organizations as mandated reporters
